p: All cattle imported into Egypt are slaughtered within the quarantine premise to which they arrive. Therefore, the 42,255 cows imported from Sudan in 2015 were slaughtered in Abu Simbel quarantine ( Fig 6B). Of the 5530 cows imported from Ethiopia in 2015, 1945 were slaughtered in Adabiya quarantine, and the remaining 3385 in Sahl Hasheesh quarantine ( Fig 6B).
